Popovers

Popovers are useful for showing additional information related to an item.

Automatically placed popovers

Popovers will appear either above or below the target item, depending on available viewport space.
If the popover cannot fit above or below the item, it will be centered to screen.

Popover #1

Popover #2

Popovers snapped to content

Popovers can be snapped to the target content's position.
At a minimum, the popover will have the same dimensions as the target item, but may be larger.

Popover #3

You can also open a popover by clicking on the image.

Centered popovers

Popovers may also be centered to the viewport

Popover #4
